sentences.en: Everyone has doubts about their readiness for parenthood.
sentences.cn: 自己是否作好了为人父母的准备，人人都会感到疑虑。

sentences.en: She may feel unready for the responsibilities of parenthood.
sentences.cn: 她可能觉得还没有准备好担当人母的责任。

sentences.en: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.cn: 猩猩母亲们则要面对长达八年的养育幼儿的单亲生活。
